page.title: 13FARMING AROUND SKELMERSDALE
page.content: HOW DO YOU SELL YOUR PRODUCE? It is all sold wholesale to local merchants. We do not sell direct to the public. HOW HAS THE JOB CHANGED SINCE YOU WERE A BOY? We have tried growing a larger variety of crops recently. The biggest change has been the reliance on modern machines and the use of fertilisers and pesticides. This has probably doubled our yield in the last 25 years. CAN YOU EXPLAIN HOW YOUR YEAR IS DIVIDED UP? Spring is spent planting potatoes,fertilising and spraying. We also sell the previous year's crop of potatoes.In summer we combine and bale and cut and sell the greens.By autumn we are sowing cereals and harvesting potatoes.Winter is spent ploughing and in maintenance. DO YOU ENJOY YOUR JOB? Yes,very much even though it is hard work.
